WorkItem.ClosedComment: I just tried 0.8.3 with 2012 Update 2 and didn't see any problems. Can you upload some logs or other diagnostic info so we can try to figure out why it's not working for you?
WorkItem.Description:
Intellisense doesn't work at all if you happen to have installed VS2012 Update 2
Can you please release a patch soon?
Without intellisense is useless.
Further on, it should fallback on VS2012 javascript intellisense, hence to ignore the TypeScript specific keyworkds
WorkItem.Summary: Intellisense doesn't work at all with 2012.2

Comments.Message:
Found the issue!!! Tell to the wolrd!!

MySQL Tools for VS2012 caused the breakout for me!!!!
